message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is a little too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay $700,000 for it.
I understand that $700,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $850,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me a little bit, but that's still a bit too high for my budget. I could go up to $750,000.  Let me know if that works for you.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can meet you at $825,000. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
